java.lang.Runnable
public class Philosopher
extends RunnableRobot

A class of objects that can perform the "Dining Philosophers" simulation.

Version:
1.0 (Greenfoot) January 2010
Author:
Joseph Bergin

Constructor Summary
Philosopher(KarelWorld.Direction direction)
          Create a philosopher to be placed into the world and prepare it for threaded execution using its "run" method.
